LanguageData.VME_FleshcraftedArm.label: fleshcrafted arm
LanguageData.VME_FleshcraftedArm.description: A biological human arm, fleshcrafted from a corpse. This can be safely installed in colonists following a Fleshcrafting ideoligion, but will cause infections due to organ rejection in others.
LanguageData.VME_FleshcraftedLeg.label: fleshcrafted leg
LanguageData.VME_FleshcraftedLeg.description: A biological human leg, fleshcrafted from a corpse. This can be safely installed in colonists following a Fleshcrafting ideoligion, but will cause infections due to organ rejection in others.
